objects.text:
• Premium Rose Gold Finish
• 925 Sterling Silver Certified
• Elegant Pink Crystal Design

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 65 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner features a luxurious and feminine display for a jewelry product. The background is a soft diagonal split between a pale blush (#FFF5F5) and peach-pink (#FFEAE5), overlaid with flowing abstract curves and dotted corner accents to frame the layout. On the left side, the primary visual hierarchy begins with a prominent header ("heading") in bold rosewood hue (#C2756A), followed by a slightly lighter subheading ("subheading") in #D98B80. Below, a short bulleted description ("description") in a muted brown (#755450) outlines key features. The price ("price") is clearly displayed, accompanied by the product rating ("rating"). A strong call-to-action button ("cta") in a rose background with white text prompts users to shop. The right half showcases a high-resolution image of sparkling rose gold wreath earrings.

**Color Palette:**
- Blush Pink: #FFF5F5  
- Peach Pink: #FFEAE5  
- Rosewood (Text & Button): #C2756A  
- Coral Accent: #D98B80  
- Warm Brown (Details Text): #755450  
- Light Coral Gradient: #F8B3AA → #F5A299  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases elegant earrings with a delicate blend of rose gold and shimmering white tones. The main colors used are a soft rose pink (#F7AFAF), representing the metal base, and bright diamond white (#FFFFFF) with subtle hues of icy silver (#D8D8D8) in the embedded stones. The rose highlights the feminine and luxurious appeal, while the white crystals add brilliance and purity. These colors are harmoniously blended—the pink frames and surrounds the sparkling stones, making them pop while maintaining a cohesive look. For a banner, this palette evokes elegance, charm, and sophistication, making it ideal for luxury or jewelry promotion.
